page.title: 05A Day in my Life by K.SLADE
page.content: I woke up at 7.30 a.m. on Thursday.My mother brought a cup of tea and a fluoride tablet into my bedroom.It was a bright morning,I fed my rabbits before getting ready for school.I played the violin in the school orchestra during assembly which started at 9.00 a.m.During the day I did Maths,English,Science and watched a television programme called "Animals in Action".I had a violin lesson with Mrs. James followed by an orchestra practice at 3.30 p.m.I went home at 4.30 p.m. and brought the rabbits up to the house for their excercise.I watched "Connections" and "Top of the Pops" on the television before supper. I had a cup of tea and watched the news before going to bed.I read "Adrian Mole" until 10.00 p.m. when I finally snuggled down in my duvet and fell asleep.
